summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Self-Sufficient Lifestyle Management App core infrastructure phase. Backend APIs working correctly, frontend UI/UX excellent with nature theme, authentication flow functional, protected routes working, and all major features tested successfully.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 when no token provided
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - endpoint is still properly protected

passed_tests: Landing page loads with correct nature theme and hero section
All 4 feature cards present (Projects, Diary & Blog, Gallery, Calendar)
Login page renders correctly with email/password inputs
Login flow works with admin credentials (admin@selfsufficient.app / admin123)
After login, user redirected to dashboard successfully
Dashboard shows greeting with user name ('Good Morning, Admin')
All dashboard cards present (startup, shutdown, today's tasks, projects, quick stats)
Navigation menu works (Dashboard, Projects, Calendar links functional)
Logout functionality works via user dropdown menu
Protected routes redirect to login when not authenticated
Forgot password page loads and navigation works
Backend API health check endpoints working
Admin user seeding working (admin already exists)
Protected API routes working with proper authorization
Admin routes accessible with proper permissions
